about_the_game:
Welcome to the wonderful world of puzzles, where you can piece together various landscapes and explore different seasons. Discover breathtaking views of mountains, forests, seas, and beaches in each time of the year. Immerse yourself in a relaxing atmosphere accompanied by soothing music, carefully selected to enhance your experience. Enjoy a comfortable interface and smooth gameplay suitable for players of all ages, including children. Dive into the realm of nature with 30 unique puzzles and take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Welcome to a world where nature and relaxation come together in harmony!



In this game you can find for you:
  • 30 unique puzzles
  • Nice relaxing music
  • Lots of beautiful images of nature

Discover breathtaking views of mountains, forests, seas, and beaches in each time of the year. Enjoy a comfortable interface and smooth gameplay suitable for players of all ages, including children. Dive into the realm of nature with 30 unique puzzles and take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Welcome to a world where nature and relaxation come together in harmony!

name: Puzzle Time: Seasons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of nature and solve puzzles with captivating images of different seasons. Discover the beauty of mountains, forests, seas, and beaches in each season of the year.
